channel.title: Learn with Zac
channel.description: Let's learn together about techy things

item.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
item.description: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
item.description: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: Images in Next.js
item.description: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on GitHub Flavored Markdown.
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: The Time Machine
item.description: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: O Canada
item.description: The scenic lands of Canada featuring maple leaves, snow-capped mountains, turquoise lakes and Toronto. Take in the sights in this photo gallery exhibition and see how easy it is to replicate with some MDX magic and tailwind classes.
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)

item.title: Sample .md file
item.description: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting
item.author: zaczajdel213@gmail.com (Zac Zajdel)
